description: Suppose you take the ten digits 0..9, arrange them in any order and then either concatenate adjacent ones or separate them with a plus or minus sign, e.g., 98-76+5-4-32+10 or 9-8-765+3041-2. The first expression totals to "1", the second example totals to "2275". This sequence lists the positive integers that cannot be expressed in this way.
